Package parentsDiseaseFinderApp

Class parentsDiseaseFinder

java.lang.Object
parentsDiseaseFinderApp.parentsDiseaseFinder
public class parentsDiseaseFinder
extends java.lang.Object
Application to compare two 23andMe parent files and find possible diseases if they get children

    • referenceMD5Downloader

      public static void referenceMD5Downloader() throws java.io.IOException
      Function to download 'variant_summary.txt.gz.md5' reference MD5 file from NCBI. Makes system prints to tell user what the program is doing.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Ambiguous read/write error

    • referenceDownloader

      public static void referenceDownloader() throws java.io.IOException
      Function to download 'variant_summary.txt.gz' reference file from NCBI. Makes system prints to tell user what the program is doing.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Ambiguous read/write error

    • referenceChecker

      public static void referenceChecker() throws java.io.IOException
      Function to check if the reference md5 is still up to date. Downloads 'variant_summary.txt.gz.md5' using referenceMD5Downloader and downloads 'variant_summary.txt.gz' using referenceDownloader if it needs to.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Ambiguous read/write error

    • variant_summaryToObject

      public static void variant_summaryToObject() throws java.io.IOException
      Function to place variant_summary data into a HashMap. Creates HashMap variantRefHashMap key: chromosome+position+refAlell+altAlell, value: Object diseaseVariant Calls parentComparer(variantRefHashMap) bigO: N
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Ambiguous read/write error

    • parentComparer

      public static void parentComparer​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​parentsDiseaseFinderApp.diseaseVariant> variantRefHashMap)
      Method receives variantRefHashMap to pass over to next function. Method receives filelocation from fileSelecter, passes it on to fileToHashMap to receive HashMaps. Creates two overlapping parent files, passes them to method diseaseSeeker. Errors restart this block of code. parentComparer calls function fileSelecter to receive location of file to use. parentComparer calls function fileToHashMap to receive filled HashMaps with variables.
      Parameters:
      variantRefHashMap - dirty way of giving passing over variable to another function

    • fileToHashMap

      public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String[]> fileToHashMap​(java.lang.String filepath) throws java.io.IOException
      Function to place a 23andMe file into a HashMap. Returns HashMap with String identifier as key, and String[Identifier, Chromosome, Position, Genotype] BigO = N
      Parameters:
      filepath - ; String with the absolute path of a file
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - restarts file selection, as a file might have been moved or corrupted.
      java.io.IOException

    • fileSelecter

      public static java.lang.String fileSelecter()
      Function for the user to select a file, returns String with file location. Stops program if filechooser is closed. Re-runs method fileSelecter if option is invalid.
      Returns:
      String fileloc (absolute file location of selected file)

    • diseaseSeeker

      public static void diseaseSeeker​(java.lang.String parent1ID, java.lang.String parent2ID, java.util.HashMap variantRefHashMap, java.util.HashMap parent1HashMap, java.util.HashMap parent2HashMap) throws java.io.IOException
      diseaseSeeker uses parentID's to check if a file exists, if it does, deletes it and creates a new file. Takes parent1hashmap, iterates through each of the values, takes the chrnr, pos and genotype to assemble the key for variantRefHashMap and checks if the assembled key is in variantRefHashMap. If it exists, retrieves data from match and writes said data in the created file. When finished, closes opens created file. bigO = N
      Parameters:
      parent1ID - String containing the ID of parent 1
      parent2ID - String containing the ID of parent 2
      variantRefHashMap - HashMap containing all diseaseVariant objects as values and chr+pos+refAlell+altAlell as key
      parent1HashMap - HashMap containing RSID as key and String[RSID, chromosomenr, position, genotype]
      parent2HashMap - HashMap containing RSID as key and String[RSID, chromosomenr, position, genotype]
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Read/Write error

    • fileSorter

      public static void fileSorter​(java.lang.String filename) throws java.io.IOException
      Function to sort file generated by parentDiseaseFinder. Needs the name of the file to read and sort. Reads the file, places contents in an arraylist, sorts said arraylist, deletes old file and places arraylist contents into a new file. bigO = N
      Parameters:
      filename - name of the file which needs to be sorted
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Ambiguous Read/Write error
